MemberSignature.Value: .method public hidebysig instance void WriteCompressedInteger(int32 value) cil managed

span.span: The value to write.

summary.span: 实现 ECMA-335 第23.2 章： Blob 和签名定义的压缩无符号整数编码。

span.span: Implements compressed unsigned integer encoding as defined by ECMA-335-II chapter 23.2: Blobs and signatures.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 如果值介于 0 (0x00) 和 127 (0x7F) ，其中包含，则将编码为单字节整数 (第7位为明文，保存在位6到 0) 中的值。If the value lies between 0 (0x00) and 127 (0x7F), inclusive, encode as a one-byte integer (bit 7 is clear, value held in bits 6 through 0). 如果值介于 28 (0x80) 和 214-1 (0x3FFF) （含），则将编码为带有位15集的2字节整数，位14明文 (保存在第13位到 0) 值中。If the value lies between 28 (0x80) and 214 - 1 (0x3FFF), inclusive, encode as a 2-byte integer with bit 15 set, bit 14 clear (value held in bits 13 through 0). 否则，编码为4字节整数，位31集，位30集，位 29 clear (值保留在第28到 0) 。Otherwise, encode as a 4-byte integer, with bit 31 set, bit 30 set, bit 29 clear (value held in bits 28 through 0).

exception.span: 不能表示为压缩的无符号整数。

span.span: can't be represented as a compressed unsigned integer.

exception.span: 此生成器不可写入；它已与另一个生成器链接。

span.span: The builder is not writable; it has been linked with another one.

MemberSignature.Value: .method public hidebysig instance void WriteCompressedSignedInteger(int32 value) cil managed

span.span: The value to write.

summary.span: 实现 ECMA-335-II 第23.2 章： Blob 和签名定义的压缩有符号整数编码。

span.span: Implements compressed signed integer encoding as defined by ECMA-335-II chapter 23.2: Blobs and signatures.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 如果值介于-64 (0xFFFFFFC0) 和 63 (0x3F) （含）之间，则将编码为一个字节整数：第7位为空，从位6到1的值位5到0，位0中的符号位 (值位 31) 。If the value lies between -64 (0xFFFFFFC0) and 63 (0x3F), inclusive, encode as a one-byte integer: bit 7 clear, value bits 5 through 0 held in bits 6 through 1, sign bit (value bit 31) in bit 0. 如果值介于-8192 (0xFFFFE000) 和 8191 (0x1FFF) （含）之间，则将编码为双字节整数：15组，位14明文，值位12到0保存在位13到1，符号位 (值位 31) 在位0之间。If the value lies between -8192 (0xFFFFE000) and 8191 (0x1FFF), inclusive, encode as a two-byte integer: 15 set, bit 14 clear, value bits 12 through 0 held in bits 13 through 1, sign bit(value bit 31) in bit 0. 如果值介于-268435456 (0xF000000) 和 268435455 (0x0FFFFFFF) （含）之间，则将编码为四字节整数：31集、30个设置、位29，从位28到1的值位27到0，以位0到1的符号位 (值位 31) 。If the value lies between -268435456 (0xF000000) and 268435455 (0x0FFFFFFF), inclusive, encode as a four-byte integer: 31 set, 30 set, bit 29 clear, value bits 27 through 0 held in bits 28 through 1, sign bit(value bit 31) in bit 0.

exception.span: 不能表示为压缩的带符号整数。

span.span: can't be represented as a compressed signed integer.

exception.span: 此生成器不可写入；它已与另一个生成器链接。

summary.span: 以 SerString 格式写入字符串（请参阅 ECMA-335-II 23.3 自定义属性）。

span.span: Writes a string in SerString format (see ECMA-335-II 23.3 Custom attributes).

remarks.format: ## Remarks 字符串采用 UTF8 编码，并以字节为单位作为其大小的前缀。The string is UTF8 encoded and prefixed by the its size in bytes. `null`字符串表示为单字节0xff。A `null` string is represented as a single byte 0xFF.

MemberSignature.Value: .method public hidebysig instance void WriteUserString(string value) cil managed

summary.span: 以用户字符串 (#US) 堆格式写入字符串（请参阅 ECMA-335-II 24.2.4 #US 和 #Blob 堆）。

span.span: Writes a string in User String (#US) heap format (see ECMA-335-II 24.2.4 #US and #Blob heaps).

remarks.format: ## Remarks 字符串采用 UTF16 编码，并按其大小以字节为单位。The string is UTF16 encoded and prefixed by the its size in bytes. 当且仅当字符串中的任何 UTF16 字符在其顶部字节中设置了任何位，或其低字节是以下任意值时，最终字节将保存值1： 0x01-0x08、0x0E-0x1F、0x27、0x2D、0x7F。This final byte holds the value 1 if and only if any UTF16 character within the string has any bit set in its top byte, or its low byte is any of the following: 0x01-0x08, 0x0E-0x1F, 0x27, 0x2D, 0x7F. 否则为0。Otherwise, it holds 0. 1表示需要处理的 Unicode 字符，这些字符需要的处理超出了一般为8位编码集提供的范围。The 1 signifies Unicode characters that require handling beyond that normally provided for 8-bit encoding sets.

exception.span: 生成器不可写入，它已与另一个生成器链接。

span.span: Builder is not writable, it has been linked with another one.
